entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29 except minus 33 over northern sections.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 except minus 33 over northern sections. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:12 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:12 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:12 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
